title: Authors and Citation
text: Singhal K (2023). tiltIndicatorAfter: Create user facing outputs tiltIndicators. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/tiltIndicatorAfter/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tiltIndicatorAfter: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators},   author = {Kalash Singhal},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/tiltIndicatorAfter/}, }

what: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
title: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
text: goal tiltIndicatorAfter conduct post-processing four indicators created tiltIndicator package. post-processing process cleans useless data adds additional columns. processed output tiltIndicatorAfter package final output user. repository hosts public code may show fake data.

title: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
text: can install development version tiltIndicator GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("2DegreesInvesting/tiltIndicatorAfter")

title: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
